TopicTitle: Where can I find high resolution planetary maps for stock KSP celestial bodies?

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I'm working on an upgrade for my KSP Trajectory Optimization Tool that requires having planetary maps.  I am specifically looking for something like this for all of the stock KSP celestial bodies.  Surely these must be out there somewhere, right?  Does any know where I can find them?

Thank you!
Have you seen Sigma Cartographer? More of a do it your self solution instead of a download - there is a pre-release for 1.10.1.
